== Perumpilavu (627714) ==

Perumpilavu is a village in the [[Talappilly]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 1003 hectares and harbouring 2228 households with total population of 9896 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Kunnamkulam]] is at a distance of 10 km. Male population is 4655 and female population is 5241. Scheduled Caste Population is 1272 and Scheduled Tribes population is 8. Census Location Code of the village is 627714<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
